Package simulator

Class BoidsSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.Simulator
      • simulator.BoidsSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gui.Simulable
    public class BoidsSimulator
extends Simulator
    Classe étendu de Simulator dans laquelle On simule un essaim(Flocks) de type Fish ou/et Shark.
